questions.questionText: Which organization is the central bank of India?
questions.explanation: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) is the central bank of India. It was established on April 1, 1935, and nationalized on January 1, 1949. Its headquarters is in Mumbai.

questions.questionText: When was GST implemented in India?
questions.explanation: Goods and Services Tax (GST) was implemented in India on July 1, 2017. It replaced multiple indirect taxes and brought the concept of 'One Nation, One Tax'.

questions.questionText: Who was the Finance Minister of India during the 1991 economic reforms?
questions.explanation: Dr. Manmohan Singh was the Finance Minister during the 1991 economic reforms under Prime Minister P.V. Narasimha Rao. He later became the Prime Minister of India (2004-2014).
GDP stands for Gross Domestic Product. It is the total value of all goods and services produced within a country in a specific time period, usually a year. It is a key indicator of economic health.
